meanings.definition: A person who specializes in Jewish law.
meanings.sent1: The halakist studied Jewish law diligently.
meanings.sent2: The halakist provided valuable insights into Jewish law.
meanings.sent3: The halakist joked that they dreamt of laws instead of sheep.
meanings.sent4: In the world of Jewish law, the halakist was a guiding star.
meanings.sent5: The halakist's passion for Jewish law was contagious.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to Jewish law.
meanings.sent1: The halakist perspective shed light on Jewish law.
meanings.sent2: Her halakist interpretation added depth to the discussion.
meanings.sent3: The halakist approach to cooking involved following strict rules.
meanings.sent4: The halakist influence could be felt in every aspect of the community.
meanings.sent5: The halakist teachings resonated with those seeking guidance.
